# anchorUpdates

**Instance Property**

A sequence of updates to anchors a provider tracks.

## Declaration

```swift
final var anchorUpdates: AnchorUpdateSequence<WorldAnchor> { get }
```

## Discussion

An async sequence providing all anchor updates. The provider vends new or updated world anchors via the sequence as they become available.

Identify the anchors you want to react to by calling [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/Anchor/id].



## Tracking objects

- **init()**: Creates a world-tracking provider.
- **requiredAuthorizations**: The types of authorizations necessary for tracking world anchors.
- **isSupported**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the current runtime environment supports world-tracking providers.
- **allAnchors**: An array of all known world anchors from the world-tracking provider.
- **addAnchor(_:)**: Adds a world anchor you supply to the set of currently tracked anchors.
- **WorldTrackingProvider.Error**: An error that can occur during a world-tracking session.
